item.title: Mary-Beth add a quote by Sergei Lukyanenko
item.description: "That's the way it goes sometimes: in order to help your friends, first you have to help your enemy. Better get used to it." -- Sergei Lukyanenko

item.title: Mary-Beth add a quote by Graham Greene
item.description: "I have never planned anything illegal in my life,' Aunt Augusta said. 'How could I plan anything of the kind when I have never read any of the laws and have no idea what they are?" -- Graham Greene

item.title: Mary-Beth add a quote by Peter S. Beagle
item.description: "Real magic can never be made by offering someone else's liver. You must tear out your own, and not expect to get it back." -- Peter S. Beagle

item.title: Mary-Beth add a quote by Peter S. Beagle
item.description: "I always say perseverance is nine-tenths of any art — not that it's much help to be nine-tenths an artist, of course." -- Peter S. Beagle

item.title: Mary-Beth add a quote by Peter S. Beagle
item.description: "It’s a rare man who is taken for what he truly is." -- Peter S. Beagle

item.title: Mary-Beth add a quote by Elizabeth Knox
item.description: "So, did you need to hear that? Did you really need to know more?' Xas asked. 'Yes. It's always better to know more.' 'God help you,' Xas said with feeling." -- Elizabeth Knox

item.title: Mary-Beth add a quote by Oscar Wilde
